text: The following lists events that happened in 1938 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *Monarch - Kristján X *Prime Minister - Hermann Jónasson ==Events== ==Births== *6 January - Garðar Árnason, footballer *15 March - Þorsteinn frá Hamri, writer *18 March - Álfrún Gunnlaugsdóttir, writer *23 June - Hjalti Einarsson, handball player. *27 June - Björgvin Hermannsson, footballer *24 August - Halldór Blöndal, politician. ===Full date missing=== *Atli Heimir Sveinsson, composer ==Deaths== *21 May - Einar Hjörleifsson Kvaran, editor, novelist, poet and playwright (b. 1859) ==References== Category:1930s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1938 in Iceland
